1.0.name: wordpress/simple-google-sitemap
1.0.description: Simple Google Sitemap is a plugin to create automatically an XML Sitemap for your blog and pings it to ASK.COM, Google and MSN, whenever an Article was published or deleted. You can edit various options for the created sitemap file.
